name: Phish Food
description:
Phish Food Place yourself in the fins of a fish who lives in the 21st century. Escape the clutches of fishing hooks, jellyfish, and pollution. Dynamic music is a core part of the experience, so slap on some headphones and swim your way to freedom. CONTROLS: 
  • WASD - MOVEMENT
  •  Right Mouse Button - SWIM
  •  SPACE - INVENTORY
  •  Left Mouse Button - INTERACT/BOOST
The standalone Windows version is recommended for best performance. I've been programming for a minute now, but have not really done much in the way of game development for a couple of years. If you have any thoughts, or criticism I'd love to hear it. I'm looking forward to learning more and improving. (:
